Bugs and maddening enemy spawns diminished the tension of being a fleshy human scavenger in a mech battlefield. But one feature annoyed some players much more - fresh water. See, you need to keep your headquarters stocked with water, as it gets steadily used by your settlement's inhabitants. The catch being that this water diminishes even while you're not playing the game. If it runs out completely, then everything you've collected gets wiped. The developers have listened to complaints about this most Farmville of mechanics, and they've answered in an interesting way. Water thieves! Now, on top of the usual downward trickle, burglars will come to steal your H2O as well.
It's not as bad as it sounds.
Read more
articles.title: The Forever Winter devs answer complaints about water scarcity... by adding thieves who invade your HQ and steal your water

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I didn't sleep last night for entirely self-inflicted reasons and my brain feels like that one accursed hoover bag you refuse to empty, because there is no way of doing so that won't turn the neighbourhood into Silent Hill. I need to avoid any complicated write-ups, or my brain will detonate similarly and paint north London grey.
Ah, a minigolf game! I think I can just about hack the concept of minigolf, on this most desperate of Mondays. It is golf but mini. Bonzai golf. Digestible! Intuitive! Why, I've managed to write 100 words without even looking at the Steam page. Let's do so now. Wait a minute, this isn't minigolf. It's Mini Mini Golf Golf. What is Mini Mini Golf Golf? "Destabilize the present and plunge into a neon psychohistory of a bizarre entity in distress," the Steam page explains. "This is not a game about minigolf." It is too late to flee.
 Read more
articles.title: It's never too early in the week to play 4D minigolf

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
I was excited for Slitterhead, an action adventure game by Bokeh Studio, a studio founded by none other than your boy Keiichiro Toyama: the creator of Silent Hill, Gravity Rush, and the Siren series. And within that first hour, Slitterhead's body-possessing and Hong Kong-inspired streets had me thinking, "Is this it, the sleeper hit of 2024?!"
No, sadly not. It's no doubt built a compelling universe filled with brain-sucking aliens that masquerade as humans, and it attempts plenty else besides: bouncing between bodies as you stealth around dingy apartment blocks, fighting with blood katanas, and gorging on pools of red plasma to refuel skills, many of which require more body-flitting. Thing is, they are ultimately just attempts, attempts that fall victim to an emptiness and jitteriness that quickly reveals Slitterhead's true, irritating form.
Read more
articles.title: Slitterhead review: body-hopping action horror that's best left dispossessed

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
I didn’t get much further in the extremely popular beta for the haute-couture-asaurus action of Monster Hunter Wilds than perfecting the exact orange-to-white ratio of my cat. Not because I wasn’t having fun, but because I immediately started looking up GPU prices after playing for ten minutes. As such, I didn’t spend enough time with the combat to get a proper feel for it. Cultural osmosis has once again allowed me to form an uneducated take, however, and I’m getting the sense there’s been some mixed reactions re: bonk quality. According to a clip shared on X by user Blue Stigma, there's a good reason for those misgivings. It's all about frames, you see.
Read more
articles.title: No, you're not imagining Monster Hunter Wilds' beta combat feeling off  - there's a good reason for it

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
One of my lesser quality tests for an RPG is whether the shopkeepers complain at you for not buying anything. Grumpy shopkeepers, good RPG. This most specific of litmus tests has served me well, although I must admit that I’d happily upgrade it to ‘shopkeepers you can attack’, would that not disqualify 99% of games. But not turn based dungeon crawler Thysiastery, it turns out. This “dungeon crawler RPG featuring traditional roguelike and turn-based gameplay” apparently trusts you enough to let you recklessly batter its friendly wandering lizard merchants. You’d be a monster for it, of course, but it’s nice to have options.
Read more
articles.title: Thysiastery is an anime Legend Of Grimrock, and you can attack the dinosaur merchants if you’re a complete monster

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Put your hand up if you'd forgotten that every Assassin's Creed game is, strictly speaking, set in the present day. I know I had. That's not the actual distant past you're parkouring through. That isn't actual Renaissance architecture you're clambering on. It's a holographic Animus simulation, conjured from ancestral memories flash-frozen within your DNA - convenient, inasmuch as it means that any inconsistencies are your DNA's fault, not Ubisoft's. If the ledge-mantling animations are glitchy, that's simply because you have bad genes.
We can both be forgiven for losing sight of Assassin's Creed's modern day narrative frame. Ubisoft themselves have downplayed it since the era of Desmond Miles, the watery Peter Parker figure who served as puppetmaster protagonist for AC games up to Assassin's Creed 3. In Assassin's Creed Shadows, however, they're planning to bring back the modern day setting in a big way, though details are scanty.
 Read more
articles.title: Assassin's Creed Shadows will reboot Assassin's Creed's patchy modern-day story

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
SCENE. A Video Game Website At Sunrise.
Enter A Reader Of News
A Reader Of News I wonder whither there be'est any new PC games on sale this week, perchance?
Enter A News Editor, With Alarums And Excursions
Read more
articles.title: The Maw: what's new in PC games this week?

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Sunday is cancelled. Book for now!
 Read more
articles.title: What's on your bookshelf?: Solipsism Xtreme Edition

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
It's official: I am once again the Sunday correspondent around here. That means it falls to me to round up (mostly) good (mostly) writing about (mostly) video games. I will otherwise be spending my Sunday continuing the fight against my dog's fleas, which rebound every three weeks no matter how much I spray, scrub or throw things away.  
On, the independent video game magazine which I linked to last week, has run a series of brief interviews with each of the contributors to its launch issue. I recommend Christian Donlan's for the puzzle game recommendations and Margaret Robertson's which expands on her fascination with Japanese paper games.

 
Read more
articles.title: The Sunday Papers

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
BioWare currently has no plans for Dragon Age: The Veilguard expansions, according to reports. Instead the studio will support the fantasy RPG with smaller updates and otherwise turn their full attention towards Mass Effect 5.

 
Read more
articles.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard won't get expansions, reports say, as BioWare move to the next Mass Effect

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
The Elder Scrolls: Legends, the free-to-play card game set in Bethesda's fantasy world, has been removed from sale on Steam. Its servers will shut down for good on January 30th, 2025, after which it will no longer be playable. The closure comes five years after the game was last updated.

 
Read more
articles.title: Elder Scrolls: Legends has been removed from sale and will become unplayable in January 2025

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Typing Of The Dead released in arcades 25 years ago remains a masterpiece - funny, absurd, tense, and novel. I am keen on any game that aims to follow in its footsteps, and there are a few. The latest is Blood Typers, a horror game where you tippity-tap on your keyboard to fight montsters in a spooky mansion, but this isn't a rail shooter, so you'll be typing to explore and navigate, too.

It's now got a release of February 2025, and there's a demo you can play now.

 
Read more
articles.title: Typing Of The Dead meets Resident Evil with co-op in Blood Typers, which has a demo you can play now

articles.author: Ollie Toms
articles.description:
Okay, look folks, I'm terribly sorry you've been trapped in the bubble of silence for this weekend while comments are still un-fucking themselves. I'm expecting some really juicy catch-up comments next weekend! In the meantime, this post will stay up as usual so you can at least hear what we're getting up to in the treehouse.
Congratulations on making it to another checkpoint, fellow traveller. Please spend your hard-earned coin on one of the following bonuses: either a weekend of games but no sleep; a weekend of sleep but no games; or a weekend of health and activity but nothing to post in the comments below? Your choice! Here's what we're all clicking on this weekend.
 Read more
articles.title: What are we all playing this weekend?

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Like a plague doctor delicately administering another handful of leeches, Ice Pick Lodge have shared a bit more about the recently announced Pathologic 3, explaining how their plans for the cult epidemic-battling series have progressed since the release of Pathologic 2.
Read more
articles.title: Pathologic 3 devs keen to avoid "premature promises" about bringing back the Changeling in Pathologic 4

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
People have asked me, a Call Of Duty liker, "How's the new COD?" - such is the mass appeal of Call Of Duty that even a lot of my non-industry pals are invested in whether Black Ops 6's shooty really does bang. And every single time my brain clunks into gear and I turn inwards, where I struggle to come up with anything meaningful to say. So much so that a fog develops and out of the fog emerges a figure - it's me. I'm holding an M4A1 with an extended barrel and a vertical foregrip. My brain and body perform a pincer movement of physical response: 1) I shrug 2) I say, "It's like Call Of Duty".
Read more
articles.title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 multiplayer review: it's like Call Of Duty

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
There’s plenty that you could justifiably expect from a Bioware RPG: chats with mates, opportunities to get those mates horribly killed, surviving mates turning to the side then walking offscreen. But I don’t think anyone expected Dragon Age: The Veilguard to be, at least on a purely technical level, one of the smoothest-performing, settings-rich AAA PC releases of the year so far.
Read more
articles.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard on PC is the surprise AAA tech success of 2024

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Stroll on down to Uncle Capcom's garage, girls and boys, because it's time to meddle with a cat's voicebox, ride a combat peacock and meticulously injure a vast, blubbery teddybear. By which I mean, the Monster Hunter Wilds beta is now live on Steam through to 4th November at 2.59am GMT. That's 2.59am sharp. If you're hurrying along at 3am on Monday absolutely desperate to polish the aesthetics of a small enslaved catperson, you can sod off and play Dragon Age: The Veilguard instead.
 
Read more
articles.title: The Monster Hunter Wilds beta is live with an early glimpse of the new camping, wound and weather systems

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Remedy's Alan Wake 2 has now "recouped most of its development and marketing expenses", CEO Tero Virtala has announced in a business review for January-September 2024. Speaking as somebody who would quite like there to be more Alan Wake games - or at least, moderately weird and pretty decent blockbuster singleplayer horror games - I am both pleased by this news and a little troubled that Remedy's eldritch forest fable (which came out in October 2023) has yet to break even.

 
Read more
articles.title: Alan Wake 2 still hasn't quite made its money back, according to Remedy's latest financials

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Some days, I wonder if every word written before a trailer is actually superfluous. It’s a visual medium, after all. What can a description achieve save to clumsily gesture at the true shape of something; a dog-eared tour brochure for a thrilling weekend spelunking in Plato’s cave? I can usually shake this feeling, but gory zombie action game Showa American Story is my breaking point. There is nothing I can impart about this thing that will not be conveyed better by allowing its new trailer to wash over you like a tide of sheer videogame. Here’s it:
Read more
articles.title: Showa American Story is Yakuza: Dead Souls meets Tokyo Gore Police, and it looks incredible

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Real gamblers play russian roulette with shotguns. That is the core concept of Buckshot Roulette, the Inscryption-looking game of blinksweat and bulletworry. It's been out for a while now but the developers have just added a fun extra - a 4-person multiplayer mode. 
Read more
articles.title: Buckshot Roulette now has a 4-person multiplayer mode, which I'm sure you will survive

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Some extremely fresh vintage workwear that I bought for entirely practical reasons aside, I’m not exactly a fashion person. I have nobody to impress most days but my cat, and the only item of clothing she appears to have an opinion on is my Oodie, which is very comfortable for both of us and also smells like a chicken shop, which I imagine is more pleasant for her than me.
This aside, I found myself taking a whole bunch of Dragon Age: The Veilguard screenshots as I played just to capture the RPG’s various outfits. They are ridiculous. Incredibly intricate and detailed, as well as being obscenely impractical for the most part. I do not like any of them in the sense I would wear them, but I like all of them in the sense that they display artists allowed to run free like caffeinated weasels and indulge their every whim.
Read more
articles.title: I am deeply enamoured by Dragon Age: The Veilguard's intricate and ridiculous fashion design

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
The Steam Deck is something of a talisman for gaming on Linux, its popularity and penguin-powered SteamOS having almost singlehandedly dragged it past MacOS as the second-most-used operating system among Steam users. Sadly, this also means the Valve handheld is the primary casualty when developers decide to stop bothering with Linux support, as Respawn Entertainment have decided to do for Apex Legends.
Read more
articles.title: Respawn have killed Apex Legends' Steam Deck support in the name of anti-cheat

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
You remember Lucas Pope, right? He who casually dropped two of the most influential puzzle games ever then got distracted by yellow cranks for six years, occasionally popping up to drop a demake of Papers Please? Well, Pope has ceased hogging that crank, for now at least, and just released Haloween-y adventure game Moida Mansion. It’s on Itch here, and it’s completely free to play in your browser.
Read more
articles.title: Moida Mansion is the new free game from Return Of The Obra Dinn’s Lucas Pope, and it's out now

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Part of the fun of Dragon Age's fantasy is that it's inconsistent - or at least, inconsistent by the standards of fantasy RPGs, which often break down into a million neatly organised and interlocking codex entries. It all rides on who you speak to. The humans believe one thing about the origins and workings of Thedas, the elves another, the qunari something else entirely. These differences are the basis for many factional disagreements and thus, many core series plot developments. According to former lead writer David Gaider, however, there's an "uber-plot" behind it all that may one day be resolved and bring the series to a close, assuming BioWare continue to refer to his original (and closely guarded) narrative documents.
 
Read more
articles.title: The trick to Dragon Age's lore is that the lore is lying, says original "uber-plot" writer David Gaider

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Inflexion Games are closing their UK office, laying off staff and restructuring their main Canadian studio after failing to find commercial success with their Victorian fantasy survival game Nightingale. Reportedly, at least 22 people have been let go.
 Read more
articles.title: Nightingale can't outfly "the stark realities of the industry" as creators Inflexion close UK office and lay people off

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Vondráček)
articles.description: Na Univerzitě Pardubice jsme se rozhodli nasadit IPv6 only síť na eduroamu. Získané zkušenosti nyní sdílím, protože mi při práci chyběl komplexní návod, který by spojil jednotlivé služby do jednoho řešení.
articles.title: Univerzitní eduroam pouze na IPv6: CLAT, DHCPv6 a logování

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Sluka)
articles.description: Pravidelná středeční sonda do světa software. Dnes se společně podíváme na vizuální editor webových aplikací, vytrénujeme si jazykový model a nakonec si necháme vytvořit odhad spotřeby energie.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (13. 11. 2024): upravujte web přímo za provozu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V neděli 3. listopadu proběhl druhý den letošní konference OpenAlt. Mluvilo se o regulaci technologií, moderním linuxovém instalátoru, retro notebooku, mobilním systému Sailfish a snu o létajícím kole.
articles.title: Létající rotoped, regulace technologií a retro notebook, neděle na OpenAltu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Dnes si ukážeme další možnosti čipu OPL3, zejména použití nových podporovaných tvarů vln (waveform) a taktéž režim propojení čtyř operátorů, které vytvoří jediný kanál.
articles.title: Programování zvukových karet s čipem OPL 3: modifikace tvaru vlny a zvukové kanály se čtyřmi operátory

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: ČD - Telematika)
articles.description: V dnešním díle pravidelných pondělních postřehů z oblasti kybernetické bezpečnosti se podíváme na boj s DDoS útoky, mezinárodní operace Interpolu, opravu kritických chyb v Androidu a malware CRON#TRAP.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: pád tržiště pro DDoS útoky

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Vývojový tým stojící za prostředím LXQt napsaným v Qt oznámil vydání LXQt 2.1 s experimentální podporou Waylandu. Na FreeCADu postavený komerční CAD Ondsel po dvou letech ukončil svou činnost.
articles.title: LXQt 2.1 s podporou Waylandu, komerční CAD Ondsel skončil

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Ryzen 7 9800X3D je hit, balení pro Evropu mají překupníci, týden v KDE se spoustou opravených chyb, vývojová verze Wine 9.21, vývoj Mesa 24.3 se chýlí ke konci, vytvořena větev 25.0.
articles.title: Blender má nové malířské možnosti, AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D nedostatkový

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Detectron2 je framework vyvíjený a udržovaný firmou Facebook, který slouží k detekci objektů a segmentaci obrázků, zahrnující implementaci mnoha modelů, např. RetinaNet, Mask R-CNN, Faster R-CNN a dalších.
articles.title: Detectron2: najdi mi na fotce medvěda

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: V novinkách pro další verzi linuxového jádra se aktuálně činí AMD, která řeší jak efektivitu chodu Radeonů, tak vylepšení pro svá CPU z hlediska výkonu, efektivity plánování úloh i snižování dopadu oprav na Spectre.
articles.title: Linuxové jádro 6.13 a Mesa 24.3: nejen Vulkan pro 12 let staré Radeony

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Projekt LibreQuake si klade za cíl vytvořit open-source FPS inspirovanou herní legendou Quake. Descent 3: Piccu Engine je fork open-source enginu Descent 3. Firma Nintendo zařízla další emulátor Nintenda Switch Ryujinx.
articles.title: LibreQuake vytváří nový klon Quake, Descent 3 znovu v Piccu Engine

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Linuxové jádro verze 6.13 je teprve na cestě. V rámci ní chystá AMD přepnutí svých procesorů z architektonicky staršího řízení provozních parametrů pomocí ACPI CPUfreq na vlastní ovladač AMD P-State. Prvotní měření Phoronixu ukazují, že výsledkem bude úspornější chod, resp. vyšší výkon.
articles.title: Test AMD P-State na EPYC 9005 na jádru 6.13 ukazuje, že AMD se dobře připravila

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: O půlnoci z pondělí na úterý příští týden bude zahájen prodej kusově omezené bílo-šedé varianty přenosné konzole Steam Deck OLED za cenu 679 dolarů. Zařízení mohou zakoupit Steam uživatelé s nějakým předchozím nákupem na Steamu před listopadem 2024 a kteří současně nemají ban.
articles.title: Limitovaná edice Steam Deck OLED v bílém provedení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Od 1. března příštího roku zvýší sdružení CZ.NIC velkoobchodní cenu domény .CZ na 160 korun (bez DPH) za jeden kalendářní rok. Dosud byla velkoobchodní cena české národní domény 145 korun (bez DPH), jedná se tedy o zvýšení o 15 korun.
articles.title: CZ.NIC zvýší velkoobchodní cenu domény na 160 korun bez DPH

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tomáš Heřmánek)
articles.description: Společnost initMAX pořádá webinář zdarma, tentokrát na populární téma bezpečnosti - Zabbix: Security Best practices + External Vault. Rezervujte si datum 14. listopadu 2024 od 10:00 do 12:00. Zabezpečení Zabbixu - pokryjeme ochranu komunikace frontendu, serveru, proxy, databáze a napojení na externí klíčenky (HashiCorp, CyberArk, OpenBAO), včetně praktické ukázky propojení.
articles.title: Zabbix: Security Best practices + External Vault - webinář zdarma

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Ve dvou nově vydaných Intel Security Advisory (INTEL-SA-01079, INTEL-SA-01101 informuje americký výrobce o opravě tří zranitelností svých procesorů Xeon.
articles.title: Intel opravuje tři zranitelnosti CPU Xeon s SGX, vydal aktualizaci mikrokódu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Linux je v síťovém prostředí jako doma, může zastat prakticky všechny potřebné role od směrovače (router), přes DHCP, DNS až po souborový server Samba pro Microsoft Windows. Přijďte se to všechno naučit na naše třídenní školení s názvem Linux: správa počítačové sítě.
articles.title: Linux a správa počítačové sítě (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost VMware oznámila, že její desktopové hypervizory VMware Fusion a VMware Workstation jsou nyní zdarma pro osobní, vzdělávací i komerční použití. S okamžitou platností přechází VMware Fusion i VMware Workstation z modelu placeného předplatného, což znamená, že tyto nástroje můžete nyní využívat bez jakýchkoli nákladů. Placené verze těchto nabídek – Workstation Pro a Fusion Pro – již nebude možné zakoupit, uvedl Himanshu Singh, ředitel produktového marketingu společnosti Broadcom.
articles.title: VMware nabízí Workstation a Fusion zdarma pro všechny

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Ve čtvrtek 14. listopadu se uskuteční OWASP Czech chapter meeting, který opět zavítá do Brna. Registrovaným jako vždy nabídne přísun zajímavostí z oblasti IT bezpečnosti a to ve formě dvou večerních přednášek, na které je registrace zcela zdarma. Detaily programu a možnost se registrovat naleznete na Eventbrite.
articles.title: Pozvánka na OWASP Czech chapter meeting 14. listopadu v Brně

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Do kompozitoru Mutter z projektu GNOME míří úprava, který zlepší jeho interní logiku rozhodování, které GPU v systému s více přítomnými je primárním. Nejde o změnu revoluční, cílí primárně na notebooky a hlavním mechanismem je preference GPU, které je připojeno na eDP výstup, tedy k internímu displeji notebooku.
articles.title: GNOME Mutter se podle eDP lépe rozhodne, které GPU je primární

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: P-State ovladač Intelu bude využívat Energy Aware Scheduling (EAS) pro mobilní generaci Lunar Lake, aktuální notebookovou generaci CPU Intel. Jde o plánovač úloh pro jejich rozdělování mezi úsporná E-jádra a výkonná P-jádra s novým přístupem, napojený na řízení frekvencí jader skrze ovladač Intel P-State ( intel_pstate).
articles.title: Energy Aware Scheduling zefektivní chod CPU Intel Lunar Lake

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Správce české národní domény posílil kapacitu první linky do národního propojovacího internetového centra NIX.CZ na 400 Gbit, čímž si zajistil nejvyšší dostupnou propustnost do páteře českého internetu po jedné lince.
articles.title: CZ.NIC navýšil kapacitu připojení do NIX.CZ na 510 Gbit/s

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: @verosk)
articles.description: Dnes okolo 15:00 vyšla oprava kritické chyby v monitorovacím nástroji Icinga. Ovlivňuje Icinga 2 Masters, Satellites i Agents v různých nastaveních. Autoři doporučují aktualizovat co nejdřív.
articles.title: Kritická oprava v monitorovacím nástroji Icinga

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Do blížícího se vydání kompilátorů GCC 15 míří nové optimalizace pro lepší běh na posledních dvou DDR5 generacích procesorů AMD, tedy Zen 4 a Zen 5 (tj. Ryzeny 7000 a 9000 a jim odpovídající Threadrippery a EPYCy). Specificky jde o optimalizaci X86_TUNE_AVX512_TWO_EPILOGUES v rámci patche, který do projektu zaslal Richard Biener ze SUSE.
articles.title: GCC 15 dostane AVX-512 optimalizace pro AMD Zen 4 a Zen 5

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: GitHub Spark je technológia na tvorbu aplikácií pomocou AI asistenta a plne manažovaného prostredia. Umožní vytvárať a zdieľať tzv. mikroaplikácie (sparks) pomocou prirodzeného jazyka. Bežní užívatelia budú tak môct vytvárať kompletné aplikácie bez potreby programovať alebo nasadzovať kód.
articles.title: GitHub Spark: tvorba mikroaplikácií pre bežného smrteľníka

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Dnes vyšel oblíbený open source nástroj na testování RAM pro x86 Memtest86+ ve verzi 7.20. Nová je podpora architektury Loongson LoongArch (LA664), což je teprve druhá architektura po x86, co Memtest86+ podporuje.
articles.title: Memtest86+ 7.20 s podporou NUMA, Zen5 a Core Ultra

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: PHPStan je open source statický analyzátor kódu v PHP. Dnes vyšel ve verzi 2.0. Mezi novinky opatří nová úroveň kontroly 10 (level), která je popisovaná jako „9 na steroidech“. Dále byla snížena paměťová náročnost o 50–70 %.
articles.title: PHPStan 2.0: statický analyzátor PHP

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Vývojář Matteo Croce vyvinul nástroj Debcow určený pro Debian na souborových systémy s COW (copy-on-write). Na těchto souborových systémech potom dpkg při instalaci balíčků používá místo kopírování reflink, což celou instalaci podstatně zrychluje.
articles.title: Debcow pro Debian a souborové systémy s COW

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Nedávné aktualizace Windows 11 22H2 a 23H2 v některých případech rozbíjí OpenSSH server.  Jde o říjnovou aktualizaci KB5044285 a předběžnou aktualizaci KB5044380.
articles.title: Aktualizace Windows 11 rozbíjí OpenSSH server

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Linuxových systémů přibývá, každý den se spouštějí nové servery a někdo se o ně musí starat. To znamená spoustu různých dovedností specifických právě pro linuxové prostředí. Jak to zprovoznit, kudy bezpečně dovnitř, co tam najdeme, jak se o to postaráme a jak to nastavíme nebo rozšíříme.
articles.title: Naučte se používat Linux správně a bezpečně (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: strepon)
articles.description: Německá společnost Allotropia oznámila vydání beta verze nového produktu ZetaOffice, kancelářského balíku založeného na LibreOffice.
articles.title: První vydání ZetaOffice s kancelářským balíkem ve WebAssembly

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Microsoft na blogu ve středu popsal nové AI funkce v aplikaci notepad a kreslení.  V kreslení je dostupné namalování objektu podle textového promptu a smazání objektu po jeho přibližném označení. Mazání bude dostupné všem, kreslení jen pro Copilot+ PC.
articles.title: Notepad a kreslení ve Windows 11 dostanou funkce AI

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Jádro Linuxu umožňuje preemptivní multitasking již od verze 2.5.4. Na výběr jsou v současnosti tři možnosti: PREEMPT_NONE pro servery, PREEMP_VOLUNTARY pro desktop a PREEMPT pro desktop s požadavkem na nízké latence. Vybrat je potřeba při kompilaci jádra. Navíc existuje od jádra 5.12 možnost PREEMPT_DYNAMIC, kdy je možné volbu nastavit jako parametr jádra. Bohužel na některých platformách (arm64) je to spojené se značnou dodatečnou režií, proto se nepoužívá. Nejčastěji v distribucích vidíme PREEMPT_VOLUNTARY a třeba Ubuntu navíc nabízí jádra s označením -lowlatency, které právě mají zapnutý plný PREEMPT.
articles.title: Jádro 6.13 bude mít PREEMPT_LAZY

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Před pár dny vyšel GIMP 3.0 RC1.  Autoři k tomu napsali obsáhlý příspěvek na blogu. V něm mimo jiné píší, že po vydání verze 3.0 se budou soustředit na menší vydání s novými funkcemi. A že chtějí vydat GIMP 3.2 do roka od vydání 3.0 a ne v roce 2050, což je častým žertem.
articles.title: Gimp 3.2 můžeme prý očekávat do roka od vydání 3.0

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: CEO OpenAI Sam Altman ve středu oznámil novou doménu chat.com pro ChatGPT. Zajímavé je, jak se k lukrativní doméně dostal. Dharmesh Shah koupil doménu na začátku roku 2023 za 15,5 miliónů dolarů. Tu poté prodal za neupřesněnou částku právě OpenAI.
articles.title: ChatGPT má novou doménu chat.com

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Vývojář Intelu Dave Hansen poslal včera do LKML návrh, aby jádro hlásilo zastaralý mikrokód procesoru jako zranitelnost. Dave říká, že v současnosti prakticky není možné provozovat starý mikrokód a zároveň pokládat počítač za bezpečný. Zranitelnost navrhuje zobrazit pomocí „Vulnerable“ pohromadě s ostatními zranitelnostmi v souboru:
articles.title: Intel má úpravu jádra, které bude hlásit starý mikrokód jako zranitelnost

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Přehled říjnových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra, citáty týdne a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za říjen 2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Umělá inteligence zvyšuje náklady na datová centra, hlavně kvůli spotřebě elektřiny. Hospodářská komora: Zákon o kybernetické bezpečnosti výrazně zvýší náklady pro firmy. Global Mobile Broadband Forum 2024: 5.5G a AI jako základ nové éry mobilní komunikace. Digitální podnikové služby v Česku nabírají na síle: 175 tisíc zaměstnanců, robotizace a nové investice táhnou růst. Dell Technologies rozšiřuje portfolio Dell AI Factory o nové servery PowerEdge. Agentforce od Salesforce: důvěryhodní, autonomní agenti s umělou inteligencí posilují pracovní síly ve firmách.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Umělá inteligence zvyšuje náklady na datová centra, hlavně kvůli spotřebě elektřiny

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Matematiku a přírodní vědu prý spojuje stejná role náhodných procesů a pravděpodobnosti. Opice, Shakespeare a Rossův–Littlewoodův paradox. Vědci odhalili původ meteoritů dopadajících na Zemi.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Že by za Fermiho paradox mohla umělá inteligence?

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 45/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: HP Wolf Security: nové důkazy o útocích prostřednictvím malwaru generovaného AI. Matrix odhalí kvalitu a efektivitu agilního vývoje. Platformové inženýrství může naplnit přísliby přístupu DevOps. Úloha AI v řízení finančních rizik v Evropě. V grafenu poprvé detektovali elektronové víry. Asseco představuje širokou škálu inovací v rámci své mezinárodní skupiny.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: V grafenu poprvé detektovali elektronové víry

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Robotický lovec s umělou inteligencí ochrání kritickou infrastrukturu před útoky dronů . Antihmota v kosmickém záření znovu otevírá otázku temné hmoty v podobě části WIMP. Asteroid, který vyhubil dinosaury, mohl současně odstartovat zemědělství mravenců.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Sonda Psyche opět posunula rekord v laserové komunikaci

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 44/2024

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Už vás unavuje sedět za pirátskými „Windows, nebo se dívat na otravné připomínky k aktivaci? Dobře, máme pro vás dobrou zprávu – právě teď, při oslavě nadcházenícího Black Friday, se prodávají klíče k Windows 10 a and Windows 11 s obrovskými slevami. Dále máme zvláštní promokód, který udělá ceny ještě lákavějšími.
articles.title: Získejte u Goodoffer24 na Black Friday Windows 10 jen za €14, Windows 11 za €20

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Rekapitulace nových vydání linuxových a BSD distribucí: vyšel nový Linux Mint, Nobara Project, balík distribucí LinuxSchools či stabilní Vanilla OS 2, aktualizovány byly Peppermint OS, Finnix, Raspberry Pi OS, Clonezilla Live, NomadBSD, OpenMandriva ROME, Tails, KaOS, OPNsense a MidnightBSD. Naopak prakticky skončil projekt Funtoo.
articles.title: Distribuční novinky 27-30/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Pouze 11 % ředitelů IT oddělení firem plně implementovalo umělou inteligenci. Mají obavy o data a bezpečnost. Gitex Global 2024: Huawei představila nová řešení a vyzdvihla partnerský ekosystém. Malé a střední podniky si mohou nechat otestovat svá řešení AI. Fortinet rozšiřuje svou nabídku zabezpečení v cloudu představením Lacework FortiCNAPP. Sophos představil nové výkonné desktopové firewally řady XGS.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Malé a střední podniky si mohou nechat otestovat svá řešení AI

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 43/2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Přesně o půlnoci z 18. na 19. listopadu 2024 bude spuštěn prodej bílé limitované edice zařízení Steam Deck OLED. Uvnitř Steam Decku běží SteamOS 3 založený na distribuci Arch Linux.
articles.title: Bílá limitovaná edice zařízení Steam Deck OLED

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: AirPody Pro 2 podporují funkci sluchadla na úrovni klinických pomůcek pro osoby s vnímaným mírným až středním poškozením sluchu. Funkce je ale geoblokována (i v Česku). Rithwik Jayasimh z Indie se rozepsal o tom, jak pomocí Faradayovy klece geoblokaci obešel (𝕏).
articles.title: Pomocí Faradayovy klece obešel geoblokaci AirPodů Pro 2

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Od 1. března příštího roku změní sdružení CZ.NIC velkoobchodní cenu domény .CZ, a to na 160 korun (bez DPH) za jeden kalendářní rok. Dosud byla velkoobchodní cena české národní domény 145 korun (bez DPH), jedná se tedy o zvýšení o 15 korun. K této změně přistoupí sdružení CZ.NIC po více než šesti letech.
articles.title: CZ.NIC změní příští rok velkoobchodní cenu domény .CZ

articles.description: Virtualizační softwary VMware Fusion a VMware Workstation jsou nově zdarma i pro komerční použití.

articles.description: One of the many changes to look forward to with the upcoming Linux 6.13 kernel cycle is the AMD P-State driver to be used by default with the new EPYC 9005 series processors. While AMD Ryzen CPUs for a while now have been defaulting to the modern AMD P-State driver that makes use of ACPI CPPC platform support for allowing better power efficiency, AMD EPYC CPUs have kept to using the generic ACPI CPUFreq frequency scaling driver. But now AMD engineers have deemed amd_pstate ready for use with EPYC 9005 "Turin" CPUs and will be the default choice moving forward. Here is more information and power/performance benchmarks for this shift while testing using the EPYC 9755 processors.

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The Centurions 100 Upgrade SBC is now live in EA FC 25, and it's an unique challenge in every way. 


For starters, you'll get a total of 100 different items by completing the challenge, but there's no guarantee of a promo item or a walkout. You'll have to submit three squads to complete the SBC, so it requires a fair few amount of fodder for sure. Let's take a look at how you can complete the challenge to unlock the rewards. 


EA FC 25 Centurions 100 Upgrade SBC tasks


The Centurions 100 Upgrade SBC has three different tasks, and here are their conditions. 


Task 1 - 82-rated squad



Min. Team Rating: 82



Task 2 - 82-rated squad



Min. 1 Players: Team of the Week


Min. Team Rating: 82



Task 3 - 83-rated squad



Min. 1 Players: Team of the Week


Min. Team Rating: 83



EA FC 25 Centurions 100 Upgrade SBC solutions


Here's a set of solutions you can use to complete the SBC for cheap. 


Task 1 - 82-rated squad



Any 10 82-rated items


Any 1 81-rated item



Task 2 - 82-rated squad



Any 10 82-rated items


Any 1 81-rated TOTW



Task 3 - 83-rated squad



Any 10 83-rated items


Any 1 82-rated TOTW



After completing the challenge, you'll get a 100 Mixed Players Pack. This is an unique pack, and it contains a total of 100 player items. The player items will be divided into 20 Rare Gold, 25 Common Gold, 30 Silver, and 25 Bronze. One of the card is guaranteed to be rated 84 or higher. 


While the SBC suddenly looks interesting, try it out only if you have enough disposable TOTW items. TOTW items are extremely important, and they're being required in almost every good SBC. Hence, it might have some merit to hold on to them for the future SBCs to come in Ultimate Team. 

The post EA FC 25: How to complete Centurions 100 Upgrade SBC appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: EA FC 25: How to complete Centurions 100 Upgrade SBC

Even though it's got its quirks, Project Zomboid largely follows the real world's rules of survival, and though we don't have zombies running around (yet), we do know that leather protects from bites. Leather strips, then, are an invaluable resource in Project Zomboid, and I'll teach you how to make loads.

Customizing everything about your Sims is one of the major draws of The Sims 4. From their hair color, eye color, skin color, clothing, accessories, and more, every minute detail about your Sims is up for you to decide.


There is one outfit, however, that doesn’t appear in Create-a-Sim for you to alter, and that’s your Sim’s work clothes. This can be an issue if your Sim shows up to their high-profile lawyer career in swim trunks. Luckily, we’re here to show you how to modify your sim’s career outfit.

The three goblin leaders in Baldur's Gate 3 are tough to handle, especially Dror Ragzlin. He deals a ton of damage to anyone he hits. However, with the right preparations, you can make it through. Here's how to take out Dror Ragzlin in Baldur's Gate 3. 



How to take out the Baldur's Gate 3 Dror Ragzlin boss


The easiest way to defeat Dror Ragzlin in BG3 is to push all his goblin soldiers down the pit while your tankiest characters deal with him. Make sure you always have someone ready to heal whoever is taking blows from his Faithbreaker Warhammer. Keep his goblin allies away from him to prevent his Aura of Leadership from boosting their damage. 


However, you must not push him down the pit if you want Dror Ragzlin's magic Warhammer, the Faithbreaker, or his Mind Flayer Parasite. Doing…

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
There's a lot to discover on the expansive grounds of Botany Manor, and you'll soon be able to do so on Sony's platforms. Publisher Whitethorn Games announced plans to bring Balloon Studios' puzzler to PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 on December 17, 2024. 


There's nothing unique to the consoles to keep an eye out for with this release, but at the very least it offers another way to explore this quaint and thoughtful little gem. Check out a brief look at the PS4 and PS5 versions in the announcement video below.




Botany Manor first opened its gates on Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam) on April 9. It's also available via Game Pass for any subscribers who want to give it a quick go as part of their membership. 


For those who haven't done so yet, Botany Manor follows retired botanist Arabella Greene. Thanks to her storied career, she now has a large collection of rare, and in some cases forgotten, plants. It's up to you to explore the manor, dig through Arabella's notes, and find out the right way to ensure their growth and continued survival. 


Botany Manor isn't just about bringing a bunch of plants back to life. Well, that's a large part of it, but it also hinges on learning more about Arabella's experiences as a woman scientist in the 19th century. You'll be able to piece together her life and what she went through, all while gathering the clues necessary to help the manor's many plants thrive. If you love plants but have the polar opposite of a green thumb, this is your ideal escape.

The post Botany Manor makes PS4, PS5 debut on December 17 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Botany Manor makes PS4, PS5 debut on December 17

articles.author: Nebojsa Prijic
articles.description:
As far as supernatural soccer goes, Blue Lock is the anime to watch, but which Roblox adaptation is the best? One of the candidates is LOCKED, with a lot of content to explore, from flows to traits and weapons. To learn more, check out the official LOCKED Trello link and also join the game's Discord.



LOCKED Trello board


Locked Discord


Locked game link


Locked YouTube channel



What is the LOCKED Trello Link?


With so much ground to cover on the soccer field, you'll need more information about the most important mechanics in the game. The LOCKED Trello board is a great place to start, as you'll find flow types like Vines or Demon Wings here. On the other hand, if you're looking for free rewards, visit our LOCKED codes page.


How to use LOCKED Trello


Screenshot by Destructoid


The best way to use Trello is to keep it on the second screen while you play so you can make the right choice in-game. I love always having Trello open, especially for the game controls. But if you're looking for something specific, accessing Trello via PC is the best option. You can easily find what you need using the F key to filter cards. 


What is the LOCKED Discord Link?


There's no better place than the LOCKED Discord server when you need to talk to other players or have questions for developers. One of the channels to visit is #announcements, where you'll find the latest news about the game development. The next step is to head to the #updates channel for more details about new content. Other useful channels are #league-rules, #giveaways, and #general.


How to use LOCKED Discord


Screenshot by Destructoid


Download the Discord app and create an account to access the LOCKED Discord server. After the verification process, you will be able to join all channels. The PC version is the way to go, as exploring content is more comfortable. 


For more information, check out our vast Roblox Archives page on Destructoid.

The post Official LOCKED Trello Link & Discord (Roblox) appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Official LOCKED Trello Link & Discord (Roblox)

Keep in mind that some flows work better with corresponding weapons, a great example being the Genius flow + Genius weapon combo. My recommendation would be to first roll for the weapon you want to play with and then decide on the best flow to go with it.

articles.author: Daniel Morris
articles.description:
Astarion is one of the most popular companions in Baldur's Gate 3. You'll likely meet him early in your adventure, a Rogue whose tongue is as fast as his sword. One thing's for sure: you want to keep Astarion around.


As a Rogue, Astarion has one distinct advantage over other Baldur's Gate 3 characters. Whether you're playing as him or bringing him along as a companion, Astarion can choose up to four feats as he levels up, as opposed to others' three. These come at Levels 4, 8, 10, and 12 for Rogues.


But which ones should you be taking for your playthrough? We're going to take a look at the best feats for Astarion in Baldur's Gate 3, to make sure you get your build just right. 


Image via Larian Studios


Best feats for Rogue Astarion in BG3


When looking at the best feats for Astario…
articles.title: Best feats for Astarion in Baldur’s Gate 3 (BG3)

articles.author: Randy Marr
articles.description:
Video games turning into board games is hardly anything new, but you love to see it when it's one of your favorite franchises. Shin Megami Tensei is next to get a board game adaptation, and it's available on Kickstarter. Currently, it stands at over double its original asking goal of around $200,000, and it only started today.


The board game isn't modeled after any one particular SMT game, but rather the general idea. If you're unfamiliar with the series, each game is a stand-alone story. They always center around a war between the forces of Law and Chaos, represented by various deities from across the world. Players travel to a devastated Tokyo recruiting demons to fight for the future of humanity. The latest title, Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance, was released earlier this year. 


Scr…
articles.title: Shin Megami Tensei: The Boardgame blasts past it’s goal on day one

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
Em and Snoop had their time in the spotlight these past few weeks. It’s time for Ice Spice to be at the front of the stage and show out in Fortnite Chapter 2 Remix. Many fans eager to get her skin will wonder how to get it, so here’s everything you need to know.


How to get Ice Spice in Fortnite Chapter 2 Remix


To get the Ice Spice or Rap Princess skin in Fortnite, she will be available in the Shop for V-Bucks. Prices should be similar to those of Eminem’s and Snoop’s skins, so expect prices to be as follows:



Ice Spice and Rap Princess outfits: 1,500 V-Bucks each


Emote: 500 V-Bucks


Jam Tracks: 500 V-Bucks


Microphone / Pickaxe: 800 V-Bucks



Like the other two rappers, Ice Spice should also have a discounted bundle with all of her accessories. It’ll most likely also include the tracks used in the Fortnite Festival mode.


Her skin and all accessories will be available starting November 14, 2024, at 4 PM PST / 6 PM CST. Check the times based on your area as they can slightly differ. 


Image via Epic Games


How to get Ice Spice’s weapons in Fortnite Chapter 2 Remix


To get Ice Spice’s Grappler or her Mythic weapon, you’ll have to defeat her at her dedicated POI called Ice Isle. It’ll take place where Shark Island is. 


The location will be decked out in Y2K decorations and obviously scream Ice Spice. When the update goes live for Week 3, this area is going to be packed with fans, people doing any quests pertaining to the area, and people wanting the new gear.


Will Ice Spice be available after the event?


Ice Spice may be made available after Chapter 2 Remix concludes, but don’t count on it being anytime soon. If you really want to cop her skin to use in a later season of the game, don’t hesitate, or at least get a skin and not the whole bundle. 

The post How to get the Ice Spice and Rap Princess skins in Fortnite Chapter 2 Remix appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get the Ice Spice and Rap Princess skins in Fortnite Chapter 2 Remix

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
GOG has announced the GOG Preservation Program, a collection of over 100 games that the company intends to improve and maintain to ensure they run in modern system environments.


To put this into perspective, as a game ages and PC technology changes and advances, compatibility is often lost. An older game may not have support for higher resolution monitors, game controllers, or even operating systems. Some shaders that were used decades ago might not look right, or new bugs may crop up on newer drivers. A lot of the time, fans need to step in to create fixes or patches to keep these games running on new machines. 


GOG has always done some work to make sure games on its storefront run correctly when they’re added. Usually, this just involves creating a DOSBox launcher for pre-Windows gam…
articles.title: GOG is launching GOG Preservation Project to ensure old games remain playable on modern PCs

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
If EA FC 25 rumors are to be believed, Track Stars is going to be the next promo, and we already have the first set of leaks doing the rounds on social media.


Like the previously released Total Rush promo, Track Stars will make its debut in this year's Ultimate Team. As of writing, it's not clear if the upcoming campaign will be a one or two-week affair. Nevertheless, a new campaign is always exciting, and there could be some amazing cards to find in the packs.


EA FC 25 Track Stars player leaks


There haven't been too many leaks so far, but there's an indication that Track Stars will have a new version of Heroes. So far, we have had the base versions of Heroes that can be found in the packs. The Track Stars variant could be quite popular, but it will depend on which footballers are going to be present in it.


So far, these are the names that have been leaked to appear in the upcoming campaign.



Theo Hernandez


Lucio


DaMarcus Beasley



Out of the names leaked so far, Beasley is rumored to appear as a SBC. This will be great news for those who don't want to rely on pack luck. A SBC makes it possible for all to obtain the card, but it will largely depend on the completion cost of the challenge.


More names are expected to be leaked as the release date comes closer.


EA FC 25 Track Stars release date


Unless there's any significant change in the schedule, Centurions will be a one-week affair. In simpler words, the currently available cards will be removed from the packs on Friday, November 15. Track Stars will be a direct replacement for the Centurions promo, and it could light up Ultimate Team right before Black Friday celebrations kick in.


It will be interesting to see which footballers eventually make it to the promo, and how their special cards will look like in terms of stats and playstyles. 

The post All EA FC 25 Track Stars promo player leaks appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: All EA FC 25 Track Stars promo player leaks

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Lego has really become a staple in the video game world over the years, taking over popular worlds and adding the more casual and silly Lego charm. Last year, the Lego universe expanded a bit more outside of the box with cart-racer Lego 2K Drive and the open-world survival Minecraft-like Lego Fortnite. But the next chapter in the Lego universe, Lego Horizon Adventures, is a bit outside the normal Lego formula.


While previous action-adventure Lego games have taken place inside the worlds of legendary movie franchises (Star Wars, Marvel, Jurassic World, Lord of the Rings, Harry Potter, etc.) Lego Horizon Adventures is unique in that it serves as an abridged reinterpretation of the original Horizon Zero Dawn.


My biggest concern going into Lego Horizon Adventures was that I wasn't sure how…
articles.title: Review: Lego Horizon Adventures

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl is going live on November 20 (unless there are any last-minute delays), and the upcoming title is already available for pre-download on specific platforms.


Developers GSC Game World have revealed plenty of important information surrounding the technical side of things. This includes more data on the system requirements, which will be vital for PC players before they purchase their copy. If you're on the Xbox and have access to the Game Pass or bought a copy, you can download the full game a week before the official launch.


STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl file size on Xbox


The pre-download for STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl went live on Xbox on November 12, and it stands at a staggering 146 GB. This is the same for users on both Xbox Series S and Xbox Series X, so you'll need to clear plenty of space to download all the files.


You can pre-download the file regardless of whether you purchased a standalone copy or are a member of the Xbox Game Pass. The new STALKER title will be a day-one entrant to the Xbox Game Pass. Subscribers won't have to pay any additional money to enjoy the game on the very first day.


STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl file size on PC


Image via Destructoid


While I have yet to test out the download system on Steam, the game can be pre-downloaded via the Xbox PC app. All you have to do is search for the game and start the download. On PC, the file size is set at 150 GB. It's likely going to remain the same if you purchase your copy on Steam.


While it's preferable to download the game on your SSD, you may also choose to install it on your HDD. Either way, it's going to occupy a lot of space, far more than other recent releases like Call of Duty Black Ops 6.

The post STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl pre-download file size revealed, and it’s …a lot – like, a lot a lot appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl pre-download file size revealed, and it’s …a lot – like, a lot a lot

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Whether or not you side with Technikki to turn Shipshape Island into an airship or Adaphne to turn it into a submarine, you’ll need to borrow something from Bowser. An airship engine, to be precise.


I’m going to be honest here, this is probably the only time in the game I got snagged. Reviewing a game early means I don’t have access to guides to get unstuck, so I did circles for a while to figure this out. The solution is something that might be obvious to you, I might have even missed a subtle hint spouted by a character, but it left me temporarily flummoxed, so you can learn from my mistakes.


You may have seen the airship engine on your first visit to Wayaway Island. When you enter Bowser’s store room to get the ampberries, the engine can be seen on the other side of a barrier. I want you to forget that you saw that, because it’s very misleading.


My first course of action was to return to that room, then find the way into it based on its layout. However, if you check where the door is and make the assumption that the entrance is on the same floor, you’re not going to find it. You don’t need to backtrack through Bowser’s Castle on Wayaway Island. In fact, in order to get to the airship engine, you don’t need to go back through Bowser’s Castle at all.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Instead, before you would enter the castle the usual way, instead go east down the path that runs in front of Bowser’s Castle. Along this way, you’ll find the back door. In there, you’ll need to use a Bros. Bomb (Ice/Fire charged attack) to break the boulder in the way. You can now proceed onward.


From there, it’s a bit of a tricky labyrinth to get to the storage room. It’s mostly skill-based, and it’s a straight shot to your destination. A pretty big relief if you had trouble finding where you were supposed to go in the first place.

The post Where to find the Airship Engine in Mario and Luigi: Brothership appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Where to find the Airship Engine in Mario and Luigi: Brothership

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
It's not very often that an epic award-winning game comes up at a truly incredible price, and when they do, you should definitely take advantage. Epic saga Final Fantasy XVI is one such game, and it's going for cheap on Amazon right now. 


Usually, the PlayStation 5 version of FFXVI sells on Amazon for around $50, but it's currently available for just under $25, making it half-price and the cheapest it has ever been on the shopping site. There's no known end date for this flash price drop, but you should probably make the most of it and snap it up if you haven't already.


Think about it, with 30 hours of gameplay at a minimum, that's less than $1 per hour of stellar entertainment. That's not taking into account the fact that you can spend upto 100 hours exploring, battling, collecting, a…
articles.title: Final Fantasy XVI Is Currently 50% Off On Amazon

articles.author: Cameron Woolsey
articles.description:
Epic Games has announced the return of Fortnite OG, a mode that rolls the game back to its original build — but this time, it's not going away after a month. Fortnite OG will be available again as a permanent addition on December 6, 2024. 


The news was confirmed by Epic Games today, following some recent rumors of the mode's return, in a message posted to X. 


"OG is coming BACK and is here to stay," the company wrote. "Relive Battle Royale from the start and explore the OG map, collect OG loot, and relive OG seasons. Drop back in on December 6."




Fortnite OG brings everything back to Chapter 1


Fortnite OG returns the game to Chapter 1, which launched way back in the long, long ago of 2017. Many of us were wee babes back then. Fortnite OG lets players re-experience the game on the original island map with classic weapons, loot, and more. Epic Games first launched Fortnite OG on November 3, 2023, allowing players to get all warm and nostalgic until the company ended the event on December 2. The OG version of the game came with a 50-level OG Pass and an OG Store with old-school cosmetics.


Longtime Fortnite fans have a lot to celebrate this holiday season. Fortnite OG is on the rebound, but it's rumored that Season 6 could also launch soon. While it's not confirmed, a new chapter in the Fortnite legacy along with the return of OG will make for a lot of happy fans who may soon have a lot less time. But I suppose 'tis the slaying season, right?


Image via Epic Games


Fortnite OG broke records when it launched last year. According to Epic Games, 44.7 million players logged on for a trip down memory lane, making it the "biggest day in Fortnite's history." Will that number be surpassed next month? We only have a few weeks to find out.

The post Fortnite OG is coming back for good this December appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Fortnite OG is coming back for good this December

articles.author: Jordan Devore
articles.description:
Group passwords are the backbone of Elden Ring's multiplayer scene. Whether you and our friends are playing the game's box-standard multiplayer mode or using one of the many incredible mods fans have made to trick it out, you'll need passwords to explore the Land Between as a team.


Luckily, group passwords are much more than a way to join a group for cooperative multiplayer or PVP. Many Elden Ring group passwords significantly buff the number of Runes you get when you defeat one of the game's shard-bearing bosses. Some of these passwords give you a boost of up to 5%, so you and your friends could end up squeezing a few more level-ups out of the game's most epic bosses.


Specific passwords also come with other effects, including unique summon signs, varying amounts of bloodstains, and th…
articles.title: Best Elden Ring group passwords

articles.author: Darrus Myles
articles.description:
Yanagi, the first five-star premium Agent in Zenless Zone Zero's Section 8, has made quite a splash in the community thanks to her highly unique gameplay. As a character, Yanagi is a lot more complex than most of the roster, but if you're interested in playing her at her highest potential, here's everything you need to know.


Best Yanagi Build in Zenless Zone Zero


Jumping right in, Yanagi is an Electric Anomaly character with a significant focus on Shock DoT (Damage over Time) and On-field damage. Thanks to her combo-heavy nature, Yanagi wants to be on the field as long as possible, while you still cycle through the rest of your team to apply buffs and debuffs as applicable. While she does play your standard main DPS role, her kit is highly flexible thanks to the non-static nature of it…
articles.title: Best Yanagi build in Zenless Zone Zero – Weapons, Team Comps, Discs, and Mindscapes

articles.author: Tiago Manuel
articles.description:
While it definitely wouldn't rank amongst the best console ads of all time, Sony just released a pretty cool new PlayStation ad on their YouTube channel featuring one of the best surprises we've gotten from Sony in a while. 




These ads are always cool to look at. This time we get a glimpse at what seems like PlayStation city, a place where PlayStation's famous triangle, circle, square and X replace the regular traffic signs in a way that somehow doesn't result in an accidental Carmageddon remake. We also see some buildings turning into the PlayStation's symbols, and it looks cool, but the best part comes right at the end, when it announces a price drop of $70 on the PS5 Slim Digital Edition.


The price reduction is yet to take effect on the PlayStation direct online story, so don't get too hasty on your acquisition. Still, Sony notes the promo will last until Christmas or while supplies last, so I hope you manage to find the perfect balance between the two.


Sure, the comments make sure to remind players about the dire reality of having to buy the stand separately, but you don't really need one to enjoy your games. While the notion of a console only getting a temporary price drop four years after its release date would've been laughable in any other gen of PlayStation, this is better than no Christmas miracle at all. This piece of news feels even better when you realize how, for the first time in a long while, scalpers' plans went awry as they stocked up on a bunch of PS5 Pros that nobody is buy at ridiculous prices and have since begun selling them at a loss.


You can now get the PS5's Slim Digital Edition for $379.99 until Christmas, or until supplies are depleted.

The post The PS5 Slim Digital Edition is only $379.99 until Christmas appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: The PS5 Slim Digital Edition is only $379.99 until Christmas

EA FC 25 Kelley O'Hara End of an Era SBC tasks
